questionText: How many times was this person late to meetings?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: He was never late for any meeting.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She was late once due to traffic.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: He was punctual for all meetings.

questionText: How many times did this person fail to show up?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: This never happened.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She missed one meeting due to illness.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: He never failed to show up.

questionText: What fraction of the work assigned to this person did (s)he do?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: He completed all assigned tasks on time.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She completed 70% of the assigned work.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: He completed 100% of his assigned work.

questionText: Did this person do assigned work on time?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: Yes, he did all the work on time.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She completed most of the work on time.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: He always completed his work on time.

questionText: How much initiative did this person take on this project?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: He always took initiatives and brought fresh ideas.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She occasionally proposed new ideas for improvement.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: He consistently showed initiative and creativity.

questionText: Did this person shirk any task that was necessary for completing the project?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: This never happened.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She occasionally avoided tasks she found challenging.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: He always fulfilled his responsibilities.

questionText: Did you need to clean up any of the code written by this team member?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: No, the code was clean and easy to read.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: Some parts of her code needed minor cleanup.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: His code was well-structured and required no cleanup.

questionText: Did this person make any unneeded modifications that did not benefit the project, but may have increased their score on the Github metrics?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: Not at all, he always had good explanation for his part of the work.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She made a few unnecessary changes to increase her commit count.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: He only made changes that were necessary for project improvement.

questionText: Did this person exhibit any behaviors that could cause dissension on the team?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: No, he is fun to work with.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She occasionally disagreed with team decisions but was respectful.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: He was cooperative and maintained a positive attitude.

questionText: What fraction of the documentation did this person write? (Note: Contribution of all team members should not add up to more than 100%)

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: He did 50% of the work, He made the basic structure for the documentation and took most of the responsibility related to it.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She contributed 40% to the documentation, focusing on detailed explanations.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: His contribution to documentation was 30%, mainly focused on formatting and organization.

questionText: How important was this person to the team?

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: He brought great ideas for the project and thus was very important.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: She played a significant role in decision-making and problem-solving.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: His contributions were invaluable to the success of the project.
